creator: ra0077@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

I have calculate some value of httpclient.socket.http.cps.
It will be great to have it ine jmeter.properties or in the wiki

I have used the formula : cps = (target kbps * 1024) / 8


The calcultated values

#Some example of characters per second
#Mobile data
#GPRS     : 171 kbit/s          cps=21888
#EDGE     : 384 kbit/s          cps=49152
#HSPA     : 14,4 Mbp/s          cps=1843200
#HSPA+    : 21 Mbp/s            cps=2688000
#DC-HSPA+ : 42 Mbps             cps=5376000
#LTE      : 150 Mbp/s           cps=19200000

#WIFI
#802.11a/g : 54 Mbit/s          cps=6912000
#802.11n   : 600 Mbit/s         cps=76800000

#Ethernet LAN
#10 Mbit/s                      cps=1280000
#100 Mbit/s Fast Ethernet	cps=12800000
#Gigabit Ethernet               cps=128000000
#10 Gigabit Ethernet            cps=1280000000
#100 Gigabit Ethernet           cps=12800000000

#WAN modems
#V.92 modems : 56 kbit/s	cps=7168
#ADSL  	   : 8 Mbit/s           cps=1024000
#ADSL2       : 12 Mbit/s	cps=1536000
#ADSL2+      : 24 Mbit/s	cps=3072000


Here the patch

--- HEAD
+++ Modified In Working Tree
@@ -326,6 +326,33 @@
 #httpclient.socket.http.cps=0
 #httpclient.socket.https.cps=0
 
+#Some example of characters per second
+#Mobile data
+#GPRS     : 171 kbit/s          cps=21888
+#EDGE     : 384 kbit/s          cps=49152
+#HSPA     : 14,4 Mbp/s          cps=1843200
+#HSPA+    : 21 Mbp/s            cps=2688000
+#DC-HSPA+ : 42 Mbps             cps=5376000
+#LTE      : 150 Mbp/s           cps=19200000
+
+#WIFI
+#802.11a/g : 54 Mbit/s          cps=6912000
+#802.11n   : 600 Mbit/s         cps=76800000
+
+#Ethernet LAN
+#10 Mbit/s                      cps=1280000
+#100 Mbit/s Fast Ethernet	cps=12800000
+#Gigabit Ethernet               cps=128000000
+#10 Gigabit Ethernet            cps=1280000000
+#100 Gigabit Ethernet           cps=12800000000
+
+#WAN modems
+#V.92 modems : 56 kbit/s	cps=7168
+#ADSL  	   : 8 Mbit/s           cps=1024000
+#ADSL2       : 12 Mbit/s	cps=1536000
+#ADSL2+      : 24 Mbit/s	cps=3072000
+
+
\ No newline at end of file
 #Enable loopback protocol
 #httpclient.loopback=true

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
(In reply to Antonio Gomes Rodrigues from comment #0)
> Hi,
> 
> I have calculate some value of httpclient.socket.http.cps.
> It will be great to have it ine jmeter.properties or in the wiki

Create a Wiki login, and then ask for editing rights on the dev list.
You can then update the Wiki as necessary.
